DbCommand.CommandText: SELECT booking_id, cust_id, staff_id, room_num, booking_type, total_cost, payment_date, check_in, check_out FROM dbo.Booking
SELECT booking_id, cust_id, staff_id, room_num, booking_type, total_cost, payment_date, check_in, check_out FROM Booking WHERE (room_num = @num)
UPDATE Booking SET check_in = @check_in, check_out = @check_out WHERE (booking_id = @Original_booking_id)
SELECT staff_id, first_name, last_name, gender, phone, email, job_title, address, password FROM dbo.Staff
SELECT COUNT(*) AS Expr1 FROM Staff WHERE (email = @email)
SELECT first_name + ' ' + last_name AS fullName FROM Staff WHERE (staff_id = @id)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS Expr1 FROM Staff WHERE (email = @email) AND (password = @pass)
SELECT cust_id, first_name, last_name, gender, phone, email, address, password FROM dbo.Customer
SELECT first_name + ' ' + last_name AS Expr1 FROM Customer WHERE (cust_id = @id)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS Expr1 FROM Customer WHERE (email = @email) AND (password = @pass)
SELECT pay_id, booking_id, room_num, cust_id, mop, pay_date, total FROM dbo.Payment
SELECT room_num, room_type, no_of_beds, room_description, room_price, room_status FROM dbo.Room
SELECT image_id, room_num, room_img FROM dbo.Room_Image
